cz.tzima.partialsshot.controller

Interface OnStateChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PartialSShot

    public interface OnStateChangeListener
    Listener through which controller notifies the logical core about a change of application's current status. This enables the frontend to let user know about processing of his operations.
    Author:
    Tomas Zima

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void stateChanged(StateMessage message)
      Method which is triggered each time the state is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • stateChanged

        void stateChanged(StateMessage message)

        Method which is triggered each time the state is changed. Frontend should somehow display this information to the user.

        Consult StateType to see the exact meaning of each state and concept of the state itself.

        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the current state.
